summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant Bora Barrier Repair Cream is a targeted heavy hitter that delivers clinically proven 24-hour moisture to chronically dry skin, a compromised barrier, or mature skin that just can't retain moisture on its own.
details: DetailsBenefitsUltra-rich cream delivers clinically proven 24-hour moisture and restores a healthy skin barrierSoothes skin and reduces the look of rednessEncourages healthy collagen production, firming skin and minimizing the look of fine lines and wrinklesDermatologist Tested2024 Cosmopolitan Clean Beauty Award Winner2024 Allure Best of Beauty Award Winner - Clean CategoryKey Ingredients6-Butterlipid Complex (glucosyl ceramides; glycosphingolipids; beta-sitosterols; and ceramides AP, NP, and EOP): Soothes skin, supports natural ceramide and hyaluronic acid production, strengthens the skin barrier, and boosts and protects skin's moisture levels.Zinc and Copper Gluconates: Salt minerals with anti-redness benefits and powerful antioxidant properties.Alpha Glucan: Derived from rice and used for its soothing, hydration-boosting benefits.Research ResultsIn a clinical study of 33 people Bora Barrier was proven to:Provide 24-hour moistureIncrease moisture immediately by 98%Strengthen the skin barrier in 8 hoursImprove fine lines, wrinkles, elasticity, and firmness after 4 weeksItem 2619870How To UseApply one pump morning and night to clean, dry skin. Use daily or in rotation with other Drunk Elephant moisturizers. May be mixed with any Drunk Elephant serum, treatment, or cream.TIP: Create an ultra-rich mask that can be used overnight: Mix Bora Barrier with F-Balm and wake up to a deeply quenched and strengthened skin barrier.Skincare Smoothie Tip: Try a Drunk Elephant Are We Clear Smoothie by mixing 1 pump T.L.C Framboos + 1 pump Bora Barrier + 1 pump Bouncy Brightfacial at night for smoother, clearer, healthier-looking skin.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Propanediol, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, C10-18 Triglycerides, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Beta-Sitosterol, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Calophyllum Inophyllum Seed Oil, Oleic Acid, Squalane, Butylene Glycol, Glucosyl Ceramide, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Glycosphingolipids, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Alpha-Glucan, Resveratrol, Epigallocatechin Gallate, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Gluconate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Sodium PCA, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Sorbitan Isostearate, Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Quercetin, Astaxanthin, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Ceramide AP, Ceramide NP, Ceramide EOP, Dextrin, Palmitic Acid, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Lactate, Stearic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Xanthan Gum, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Polysorbate 60, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply one pump morning and night to clean, dry skin. Use daily or in rotation with other Drunk Elephant moisturizers. May be mixed with any Drunk Elephant serum, treatment, or cream.TIP: Create an ultra-rich mask that can be used overnight: Mix Bora Barrier with F-Balm and wake up to a deeply quenched and strengthened skin barrier.Skincare Smoothie Tip: Try a Drunk Elephant Are We Clear Smoothie by mixing 1 pump T.L.C Framboos + 1 pump Bora Barrier + 1 pump Bouncy Brightfacial at night for smoother, clearer, healthier-looking skin.

reviews.headline: Super soft
reviews.comments: It is super thick and soft, but it does peel off of your face after it dries. It's annoying. Great for super dry skin though.

reviews.headline: Favorite moisturizer
reviews.comments: Perfect moisturizer that is thicker than other DE but not too thick. Absorbs very quckly and layers well with serims and under makeup. My skin stayed hydrated all winter with no redness, patches or flakes. This is meant for very dry skin so if you don't have it, then try one of DE's lighter versions. I'm buying my third soon but it only takes a minimum amount. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Reaction immediately skin started burning and a rash developed.

reviews.headline: Awful
reviews.comments: Broke out immediately

reviews.headline: Great ingredients. Terrible product design.
reviews.comments: I absolutsly hate the pump for this and have serious questions about who approved it, the packaging is cute though. Absolutely love the product though, it makes my skin feel so smooth and my face immediately is visibly less inflamed

reviews.headline: Miracle Cream
reviews.comments: I've never been this happy with a skin care product. It's so cold and dry out right now and my face has really been struggling. Dry, flaky, red, splotchy, itchy. I tried so many other products but nothing was helping. I've been sleeping with a humidifier but that isn't helping either. Then I tried this product - the overnight change was unbelievable. One use and my face looked and felt so much better. It's only been a few days but my face is almost back to normal. I still can't believe it! Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: My skin has never felt better!
reviews.comments: I was a big peter thomas roth girl but I would ranomly breakout and my pores always felt clogged. Ive used this for two weeks now. No breakouts, no dryness, my skin has seriously felt like butter!!

reviews.headline: My skin has never felt better!
reviews.comments: I was a big peter thomas roth girl but I would ranomly breakout and my pores always felt clogged. Ive used this for two weeks now. No breakouts, no dryness, my skin has seriously felt like butter!!

reviews.headline: Soft Skin
reviews.comments: My skin was noticeably soft shortly after using

reviews.headline: Need to buy!
reviews.comments: I suffer from extreme dry skin and this definitely helps and feels smooth on your face.

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin
reviews.comments: I have been using this for a couple of weeks, and it has really helped calm my dry sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: YES
reviews.comments: Ive been buying this product since they dropped it and i love it! I have dermatitis, eczema, sensitive skin, AND acne prone skin and this doesnt flare me up at all. I do use a facial mist toner (the beekman one)  before i apply this moisturizer and then i top it with vaseline. I used to have huge pores and theyve visible shrunk since using this product. I have an extremely difficult time finding face moisturizers that dont have a negative reaction on my skin but so far this one has been safe! I just hope they dont ever change the formula in thisüò≠

reviews.headline: Nice.
reviews.comments: This is so slay but ur moms not. üôÉ

reviews.headline: This is the best moisturizer I've ever used
reviews.comments: I'm 55 w dry mature skin. I've tried everything out there from La Mer to Sterm to Tatcha to everything. This beats it all & love hiw esdy it is to travel w as well - light. I use it AM & PM - put DE Intensive Hydra Serum & DE Maracula pil on the flat dispenser, press the bora bora and put the whole thing on my skin. Looks amazing - THANK YOU DE.

reviews.headline: Perfect heavy moisturizer
reviews.comments: I was looking for a very thick/rich moisturizer since I'm an avid retinol user. This stuff keeps my skin perfectly hydrated and glowy. Nothing tops it.

reviews.headline: AMAZING PRODUCT
reviews.comments: this is an amazing project. It has helped my skin so much. I know that that after eight weeks you could start seeing results, but I started seeing results after two days. This is an amazing product, but I will say this is not drunk elephants problem or anyone's, but when I did open, the cream the pump that made it into a flower was broken but other than that, this is an amazing product

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I am 53 and my skin is so glowing! Yay! Love the product, goes on rich and even without being too heavy

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I am in my 40's and i have dry, sensitive, acne prone skin as well as rosacea. Ive only used it a couple of times but its amazing! Works great as an overnight cream. Goes on thick but it feels so good! In the morning my skin is soft, less red and you cant see any dry patches. Other than the cost- i would highly recommend it!

reviews.headline: AMAZING for dry skin
reviews.comments: I got this item in Gratis (free). I love drunk elephant and was so excited. I've tried their other moisturizers and they werent moisturizing enough for me at nighttime, so I switched to the Murad repair cream. Thats a beautiful, thick moisturizer in a pump bottle just like Drunk Elephants. Its been my holy grail and I was fully prepared for this to not compare. When I tell you I immediately pushed the murad to the side I mean it. This cream is THICK and so hydrating. Winter is coming. If your skin is dry you need this!

reviews.headline: Okay product
reviews.comments: I am rating this a three only because this cream is definitely not for everyday use. It drys my skin if used daily. I use it every week now & I no longer have the drynesss I noticed before.

faceoff_positive.comments: Just bought this! LOVE IT!!! So smooth and so good on my skin! Drunk elephant is my favorite brand EVER!!! My mom steals all of my products and my room is all drunk elephant!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing product! LOVE IT!

faceoff_negative.comments:
My review was taken down. And I was told to contact customer service who has not responded to me. 

Original review:
I have used this product on and off since December. It consistently damaged my skin barrier. I changed no other parts of my routine, which consists exclusively of DE products. I purchased this hoping it was more moisturizing than Lala for winter pm use. After a few days use, my skin became dry patchy and broken out on my cheeks - which was my issue prior to switching to DE 5 years ago. I allowed my skin to recover using only Beste to cleanse in the evening, followed by Protini. Am rinse with water and follow with Protini. After my skin leveled out I tried the product again as my skin is dry in the winter. The same cycle recurred. I kept trying! I wanted this to be the advertised product, but unfortunately this is not effective and did more damage to my skin than it did benefit. I do not recommend this product and wish I could exchange it for Lala.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not effective and actually damaged my skin barrier
